directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
In large bowl, combine pasta, cucumber, celery and onion.  In small bowl, combine dressing, buttermilk and celery seed.  Toss salad with dressing and serve.
ingredients: 4  English cucumbers - peeled, quartered and chopped
1 cup creamy salad dressing (e.g. Miracle Whip)
title: Cucumber Pasta Salad
